definitions.title: n.pr.loc.,
definitions.body: city on Euphrates (As kargamis, Gargamis, cf. Dl:Par 265 ff.; Egypt. Ḳa-r‘-ḳa-ma‘ (?)-sa WMM:Asien U. Europa 263; etym. dub.; acc. to Hoffm:Auszuge Act. Pers. Mart. 163 RS:Proh. i. n. 5 = ‘ Castle of Mish, ’ cf. Dl:1.c.);—[[כַּרְכְּמִישׁ]] Is 10:9 2Ch 35:20 (LXXL Xarxameid), [[כַּרְכְּמִשׁ]] Je 46:2 (LXX Xarmeid Karxameiv). Hittite capital, E. bank of Euphr., Mod. Jerabis, or Jerbâ52; s; Schr:KGF 221 ff.; COT, on Is 10:9 Dl:l.c.., Jen:ZA vii. (1892), 365 thinks he reads G(K)ar-g(k)a-mi-si(e)-ras = ‘king of Karkemish ’ on (’ Hittite &ls) inscr. from Karkemish.
